title: ARE THE DEVS NOT GETTING PAID WELL ENOUGH? WTF IS GOING ON?
body:
I REPORTED THIS BUG A MONTH AGO, IT'S BEEN OUT THERE EVER SINCE THIS GAME CAME OUT, WHY IS IT STILL NOT FIXED, ARE THE DEVS NOT BEING PAID ENOUGH? DOES 30+10 LOOK LIKE 38 TO YOU? I WANT A REFUND OF MY NOT SO PRECIOUS LP AND 20 MILLION DOLLARS COMPENSATION ALONE WITH IT.
https://imgur.com/PRnonB2
https://imgur.com/llLsB17

replies.body:
You don't get win/loss streak or pirate gold on creep rounds.

Since you get gold at the start of the new round and you're on krugs you don't get your +2 loss streak gold

Also, you're playing way way to greedy

> [{quoted}](name=BestPudgeNA,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=XpAhxf4R,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-08-11T15:58:39.035+0000)
>
> You don't get win/loss streak or pirate gold on creep rounds.
> 
> Since you get gold at the start of the new round and you're on krugs you don't get your +2 loss streak gold
> 

This.

> Also, you're playing way way to greedy

Depends on MMR.  Greedy works a lot better the lower the MMR state of the game.
If you're level 4 and 68 HP at Krugs and still losing, there's really no excuse for not levelling/rolling.

> [{quoted}](name=BestPudgeNA,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=XpAhxf4R,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-08-11T15:58:39.035+0000)
>
> You don't get win/loss streak or pirate gold on creep rounds.
> 
> Since you get gold at the start of the new round and you're on krugs you don't get your +2 loss streak gold
> 
> Also, you're playing way way to greedy

I only play greedy with cheap sets for 1-2gold max with max 1x 3cost unit. I am gold2 or something like that and still climbing ðŸ¤ª

its season 9 and people are still like "wait riot doesnt fix stuff and they cant math?"

did you guys live under a rock or what?

The shop is on auto-refresh, so you automatically spent 2 gold.

Edit: well, apparently I'm completely wrong! Good to know. :)
Nope, the first refresh of each round is automatic and free.
Does that actually spend the 2 gold? That's...weird.
Someone at Riot didn't pay attention in 1st grade math class.

Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha, wait a minute, you expected a game ruining issue to get changed in a mere month? Have you met my friend Warwick? Or some other League champs who've had terrible bugs for years?
LOL I still remember they "fixed" the bug where champions would stand still and do nothing, and then I lost a round because my Garen decided to go on lunch break

Brought to you by the same devs who tell you that you completed your support item quest at 8:210.

You know.

Right after 8:29.
shaco has had reported bugs for years. sotp whining about 1 bug. we all know they dont know what they are doing

Bruh Fiddlesticks' laugh was broken and wouldn't work for 4 STRAIGHT MONTHS earlier this year. They're lazy and incompetent. There's plenty of articles or videos to show the work place at Riot is nothing but people being lazy and playing OTHER games all day.
There's nothing too fix. You were on a minion camp, you don't get that bonus.
But what does this actually show?
i'd say the TFT devs are getting paid more than enough considering TFT is not a league game and shouldn't exist or take any resources at all
